Hex Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes attack 50% slower for the next 5...25...30 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Phantom Pain
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW|Hex:} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Create the illusion of pain in a creature's mind.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d6} psychic damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only and does not gain a {@condition deep wound|GW} when the spell ends.
When this spell ends, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GW} for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Phantom Pain
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...4 Health degeneration. When Phantom Pain ends, that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Power Leak

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell and drain their energy.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make a Charisma saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d12}. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
Power Leak
Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe loses 3...14...17 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the reduction in initiative increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shard Storm
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Conjure up a storm of ice, and fling it at a creature, slowing them down on a hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8 + 2} cold damage, and for the duration, the target's speed is reduced by 66%.
Shard Storm
Hex Spell. Send out an ice shard that strikes target foe for 10...70...85 cold damage if it hits and causing target foe to move 66% slower for 2...5...6 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8 + 1} for each slot level above 1st, and the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ward Against Elements
entries: Conjure a ward at your location, protecting your allies from elemental damage.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. When a target takes acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage, if the target is in the radius of the spell, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Ward Against Elements
Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Elements at your current location. For 8...18...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area gain +24 armor against elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Winter
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Call forth a spirit of winter, which converts all elemental damage to cold damage.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes acid, fire, force, lightning or thunder damage, they take cold damage instead.
Winter
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For creatures within its range, all elemental damage is cold damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: a snowball

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Pacifism
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Magically convince a creature to be pacifist; this lasts until the creature takes damage.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
When the target takes damage, this spell ends on that target.
Pacifism
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe cannot attack. This effect ends if the target takes damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Necrotic Traversal
entries: Exploit a corpse to teleport to its location and corrupt creatures around it.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target so that you can teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space that you can see. Then target each creature other than you in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition corruption|GW|corrupted} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Necrotic Traversal
Spell. Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and all nearby foes become Poisoned for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ice Prison
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Encase a creature's legs in ice, slowing them down considerably.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the target's speed is reduced by 66%. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Ice Prison
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe's legs are encased in ice, causing the foe to move 66% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Melandru's Assault
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Imbue your animal companion with Melandru's wild strength, striking everything around it.

Choose one companion that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make a melee attack against all creatures that the companion can see within double the companion's range. On a hit, a target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d10} damage.
Melandru's Assault
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Melandru's Assault that deals +5...17...20 damage to all nearby foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Vigorous Spirit
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Imbue a creature with the spirit of vigor, healing them every time they attack or cast a spell.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target makes an attack roll with a weapon or casts a spell, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
Vigorous Spirit
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, each time target ally attacks or casts a spell, that ally is healed for 5...17...20 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Galrath Slash/Silverwing Slash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 8, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You imitate the famous warrior Galrath.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d6} damage.
Galrath Slash
Sword Attack. This attack strikes for +1...32...40 damage if it hits.
Silverwing Slash
Sword Attack. This attack strikes for +1...32...40 damage if it hits.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Bull's Charge
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
You charge like an enraged ox, knocking down moving creatures when you hit them.

For the duration, your speed is increased by 10 feet and when you hit a target with a melee weapon attack and if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Bull's Charge
Elite Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and if you strike a moving foe in melee, that foe is knocked down. Bull's Charge ends if you use a skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the speed increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Channeling
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Channel some of the surrounding soul energy into your spells, improving your spellcasting.

For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot. The number you need to roll decreases by 1 for each hostile creature within a 20-foot Emanation.
Channeling
Enchantment Spell. For 8...46...56 seconds, whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Balthazar's Spirit
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Imbue a creature with Balthazar's spirit, giving them adrenaline and initiative every time they take damage.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, the target gains 2 strikes of adrenalin and the target's initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.
Balthazar's Spirit

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains adrenaline and 1 Energy after taking damage. (The amount of adrenaline gained increases depending on your rank in Smiting Prayers.)

components.m: a small wooden statue

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the adrenaline gain increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mark of Subversion
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Etch a mark of subversion into the air to curse a creature, stealing health from them and stopping the spell the next time they target an ally of theirs.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next time the target casts a spell that targets an ally of theirs, the spell fails and has no effect, the target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Mark of Subversion
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally of that foe, the spell fails and you steal up to 10...76...92 Health from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Whirlwind (Guild Wars)
entries: Create a chilling blast of air that swirls around you, damaging all creatures and knocking them {@condition prone} if they attacked during their last turn.

Target each creature other than you within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} cold damage and, if a target attacked on its last turn, is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.
{@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} The radius of the spell increases by 5 feet.
Whirlwind
Spell. All adjacent foes take 15...63...75 cold damage. Attacking foes struck by Whirlwind are knocked down. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes nearby instead of adjacent.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

components.m: a large fan

spell.name: Revive Animal
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Restore to life any number of fallen companions in range.

Choose any number of friendly companions, which have not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within a 15-foot Emanation. A companion returns to life with 30% of their maximum hit points.
This spell can be used instead of the {@spell Charm Animal|GW} spell, to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on a beast {@condition charmed} by it.
Revive Animal
Skill. Resurrect all nearby allied animal companions. They come back to life with 10...77...94% Health.

components.m: a pinch of salt

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Divine Spirit
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Suffuse yourself with the spirit of the divine, accessing your spells for less cost.
For the duration, when you cast a holy themed spell of 2nd level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level lower than required.
Divine Spirit
Enchantment Spell. For 1...11...14 second[s], Monk Spells cost you 5 less Energy to cast. (Minimum cost: 1 Energy.)

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Dolyak Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Improve your defenses and prevent being knocked {@condition prone}, at the cost of your movement speed.
For the duration, you are immune to the {@condition prone} condition, your speed is reduced by 75% and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Dolyak Signet
Signet. For 8...18...20 seconds, you have +10...34...40 armor and cannot be knocked down, but your movement is slowed by 75%.

spell.name: Serpent's Quickness
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Assume the stance of the serpent, improving your ability to cast multiple spells per turn as long as you stay healthy.
For the duration, casting spells with a spell slot does not prevent you from casting other spells with spell slots during the same turn.
If you are below 50% of your maximum hit points, this spell ends.
Serpent's Quickness
Stance. For 15...27...30 seconds, recharge times for your skills are reduced by 33%. Serpent's Quickness ends if your Health drops below 50%.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 10 minutes. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 1 hour.

spell.name: Holy Strike/Stonesoul Strike
entries: Strike with holy might, dealing extra damage to {@condition prone} creatures.

Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, it takes an additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
Holy Strike
Skill. Touched target foe takes 10...46...55 holy damage. If knocked down, your target takes an additional 10...46...55 holy damage.
Stonesoul Strike
Skill. Touched target foe takes 10...46...55 holy damage. If knocked down, your target takes an additional 10...46...55 holy damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Protector's Strike

time.condition: which you take when you could make an opportunity attack

entries: Strike at a moving foe, in an attempt to protect your allies.

Choose one creature, which triggered this reaction, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
Protector's Strike
Melee Attack. If this attack strikes a moving foe, you strike for 10...34...40 more damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Call of Protection
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Call out to your animal companions, protecting them with abjuration magic.
Choose any number of companions, that can hear you within range. When a companion takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d12} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Call of Protection
Shout. For 120 seconds, your animal companion has a 5...17...20 base damage reduction.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Succor
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Grant a person succor by healing them every turn and improving their spellcasting.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains 2 hit points. Additionally, when the creature would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 19 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Succor
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this Enchantment, target other ally gains +1 Health and +1 Energy regeneration, but you lose 1 Energy each time that ally casts a Spell.

components.m: a small model house

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases each by 2 for each slot level above 3rd and the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd. Additionally, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Inspired Hex/Revealed Hex
entries: Remove a negative spell on a creature, gain initiative, and replace this spell with the removed spell for the duration.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4} and replace this spell with the ended spell for the duration.
Inspired Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...9...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.
Revealed Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...9...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Revealed Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Aura of the Lich
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Don the necrotic aura of a powerful lich, creating {@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors} from all corpses in range and increasing the potency of your death magic spells.

Target each non-undead dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, within a 150-foot Emanation. Exploit each target, turning them into a {@creature Bone Horror|GW}. Then create an additional {@creature Bone Horror|GW} at your location.
A {@creature Bone Horror|GW} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

A {@creature Bone Horror|GW} is friendly to you and your allies while you are conscious. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, a {@creature Bone Horror|GW} becomes hostile towards everything. A {@creature Bone Horror|GW} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. A {@creature Bone Horror|GW} is in the DMs control.
For the duration, when you cast a death themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting.
Aura of the Lich

Elite Enchantment Spell. All corpses within earshot are exploited and you animate a level 1...14...17 bone horror plus one for each corpse exploited in this way. For 5...37...45 seconds, your Death Magic attribute is increased by +1.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 8th level, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Ether Prodigy
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}, {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 5
Channel the latent energy of the ether into you, improving your spellcasting.
End all beneficial {@status Concentration|XPHB} spells on yourself.
For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 5th level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 8 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
When this spell ends, you take necrotic damage equal to {@dice 1d8} per level of spell slot saved due to this spell. This damage cannot be reduced in any way.
Ether Prodigy
Elite Enchantment Spell. Lose all enchantments. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +6 Energy regeneration. When Ether Prodigy ends, you lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for every three slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Crippling Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Fire a shot attempting to cripple a creature.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d8} damage, and is {@condition crippled|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Crippling Shot
Elite Bow Attack. If Crippling Shot hits, your target becomes Crippled for 1...9...11 second[s]. This attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Amity
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Magically convince a group of creatures to be pacifist; this lasts until a creature takes damage.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, regardless of a target's abilities or magic items, a target can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
When a target takes damage, this spell ends on that target.
Amity
Elite Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, adjacent foes cannot attack. For each foe, Amity ends if that foe takes damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ether Renewal
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Use the ether to heal yourself and improve your initiative per beneficial spell on you when casting a spell of 1st level or higher.

For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} per beneficial spell on you and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d6} per beneficial spell on you.
Ether Renewal
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3...4 Energy and 5...17...20 Health for each enchantment on you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Aura of Faith
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Sheath an ally in an aura of faith, reducing all damage they take and increasing the healing they receive.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when the target regains hit points, they regain 50% more hit points.
Aura of Faith
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3 seconds, target ally gains 50...90...100% more Health when healed and takes 5...41...50% less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Feast of Corruption
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Summon the ravenous maw of {@condition corruption|GW}, feasting on everything in an area, damaging and potentially stealing health from everything in its maw.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} necrotic damage. If a target was under the effect of a harmful spell, a target takes an additional {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Feast of Corruption
Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 16...67...80 shadow damage. You steal up to 8...34...40 Health from each struck foe who is suffering from a hex.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Glimmering Mark
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Inscribe a glimmering mark into the flesh of an enemy with lightning, damaging them and everyone around them every turn and inflicting blindness.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, target each creature in a 10-foot Emanation around the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d12} lightning damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 round. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.
If you target the creature with a spell, this spell ends.
Glimmering Mark

Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to your target take 5...21...25 damage each second. Foes using attack skills are Blinded for 3 seconds. This hex ends if you use a skill that targets this foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Fevered Dreams
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Spin out your foes condition-induced dreams, infecting creatures around them with conditions every time they suffer from a new one.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target gains a harmful condition, target each hostile creature other than the target in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature gains a copy of the condition gained. On a successful save, a target gains a copy with its duration reduced to 1 round.
Additionally, if the original target is suffering from two or more conditions, the target is {@condition dazed|GW} for 1 round.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Fevered Dreams

Elite Hex Spell. For 10...22...25 seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well. If target foe has two or more conditions that foe is Dazed for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Glyph of Energy
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Invoke the Glyph of Energy by drawing it into the air as a glowing symbol.

For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or lower (except Glyph of Energy), the spell does not expend a spell slot, does not cause {@condition overcast|GW}, and you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.
Glyph of Energy
Elite Glyph. Your next 1...3...3 spell[s] do[es] not cause Overcast and cost[s] 10...22...25 less Energy to cast. Your elemental attributes are increased by 1...2...2.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Victory Is Mine!
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Gloat over the suffering of a creature afflicted by multiple conditions, gaining health and initiative in the process.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. You regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier per condition on the target, and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4} per condition on the target.
"Victory Is Mine!"
Elite Shout. You gain 10...56...68 Health and 3...6...7 Energy for each condition suffered by target foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Greater Conflagration
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Call forth a spirit of fire, which converts all physical damage to fire damage.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, they take fire damage instead.
Greater Conflagration
Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all physical damage is fire damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: a candle

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Life Barrier
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Create a divine barrier around a creature, permanently decreasing the damage they take.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 6d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
If you are below 50% of your maximum hit points, this spell ends.
Life Barrier

Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, damage dealt to target other ally is reduced by 20...44...50%. If your Health is below 50% when that ally takes damage, Life Barrier ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Life Transfer
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Create a tether of life essence between you and a group of creatures, siphoning away their vitality.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Target each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. For the duration at the start of each of a target's turns, a target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Transfer
Elite Hex Spell. For 6...11...12 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes suffer -3...7...8 Health degeneration, which you gain as Health regeneration.

spell.name: Illusionary Weaponry
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Conjure up an Illusionary Sword for the duration.

This magic sword lasts until the spell ends. It counts as a simple melee weapon with which you are proficient. It deals {@damage 3d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier psychic damage on a hit or miss, cannot critical hit, and has the finesse, light, and thrown properties (range 20/60).

While wielding at least one sword conjured by this spell, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} for every two illusion-themed spells you have prepared and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
You can conjure up to two swords, which can only be wielded by you.

If you drop the sword or throw it, it dissipates at the end of the turn. Thereafter, while the spell persists, you can use a bonus action to cause all swords conjured by this spell to reappear in your hands.
Illusionary Weaponry

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals 8...34...40 damage to your targets for each melee attack. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill.

components.m: a sword hilt

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a 4th- or 5th-level spell slot, the damage increases to {@dice 4d6}. When you cast it using a 6th- or 7th-level spell slot, the damage increases to {@dice 5d6}. When you cast it using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage increases to {@dice 6d6}.

spell.name: Glyph of Renewal
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Etch a glyph of renewal into the air, causing your next spell slot to come back quicker.
For the duration, the next time you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, the spell slot expended in that casting is regained when you finish a short rest or exit initiative.
Glyph of Renewal
Elite Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell instantly recharges.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Incendiary Arrows
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Fire multiple {@condition burning|GW} arrows at a group of creatures.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Target up to three creatures in a 15-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a ranged weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and starts {@condition burning|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Incendiary Arrows
Elite Bow Attack. Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 2 foes near your target. Those foes are set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage of the {@condition burning|GW} condition increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mark of Protection
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Inscribe the mark of protection on an ally, converting all damage they take into healing.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, the target instead regains hit points equal to the damage they would have taken (maximum 5).
You cannot cast spells until the end of your next turn.
Mark of Protection

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target ally would take damage, that ally is healed for that amount instead, maximum 6...49...60. All your Protection Prayers are disabled for 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the maximum increases by 5 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Offering of Blood
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 20%
Offer your blood in a ritual to gain more magical power.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell does not expend a spell slot. After this spell triggers {@dice 2d4} times, this spell ends.
Offering of Blood
Elite Spell. You gain 8...18...20 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for every three slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Ineptitude
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Create illusory arcane interference in the mind of a group of creatures, causing them damage and blindness the next time they attack.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the next time a target is about to make an attack roll, a target takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target only takes the damage when it attacks.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Ineptitude
Elite Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, the next time target foe or any adjacent foe attacks, they take 30...114...135 damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.

components.m: a pinch of sand

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mind Shock
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 2
Use the power of your mind to shock a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and knocking them {@condition prone} if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d12} lightning damage, and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 1d12} lightning damage and are knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.
Mind Shock

Elite Spell. Target foe suffers 10...42...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers 10...42...50 more lightning damage and is knocked down. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Marksman's Wager
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
You make a wager with the spirit of the hunt, rewarding you with initiative every time you hit with a ranged weapon attack, but loosing initiative when missing.
For the duration, when you hit with a ranged weapon attack, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d8}, but when you miss with a ranged weapon attack, your initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d8}.
Marksman's Wager
Elite Preparation. For 18 seconds, you gain 5...9...10 Energy whenever your arrows hit, but lose 10 Energy whenever your arrows fail to strike.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Order of the Vampire
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}, {@variantrule Order|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 17%
Induct your allies into the Order of the Vampire, giving their attacks life steal.

Target each friendly creature within range. For the duration, a target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage, and a target regains hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt.
Order of the Vampire

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member who is not under the effects of another Necromancer enchantment hits a foe with physical damage, that party member steals up to 3...13...16 Health.

components.m: a sharpened tooth

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Defy Pain
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Make yourself numb to pain for a short duration.

For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 3d10} + Constitution modifier and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Defy Pain
Elite Skill. For 20 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health, an additional 20 armor, and you take -1...8...10 less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Melandru's Arrows
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
Sheathe your arrows in Melandru's wild magic, making them inflict bleed and deal extra damage against enchanted foes.

For the duration, when you hit a target with a ranged weapon attack, they must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Additionally, if a target is under the effect of a beneficial spell, they take {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Melandru's Arrows
Elite Preparation. For 18 seconds, whenever your arrows hit, they cause Bleeding for 3...21...25 seconds, and if they hit a target who is under an enchantment, they do +8...24...28 damage.

components.m: a hand full of sharp rocks

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd, and the damage of the {@condition bleeding|GW} condition increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Peace and Harmony
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Invoke peace and harmony on a creature, removing negative effects and reducing their duration.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. End the latest two harmful conditions and the latest two harmful spells on the target.
For the duration, conditions and harmful spells expire 90% faster on the target.
Peace and Harmony

Elite Enchantment Spell. Target ally loses 0...7...9 condition[s] and hex[es]. For 1...3...3 second[s], conditions and hexes expire 90% faster on that ally. All your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, one additional spell and condition ends for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dwarven Battle Stance
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Channel the ancient fighting style of the dwarves, gaining an additional attack, taking less damage, and disrupting foes with your attack as long as you are using a heavy weapon.

For the duration, if you are wielding a melee weapon with the heavy property, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn; when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 3d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage; and when you hit a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn.
Dwarven Battle Stance
Elite Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, if you are wielding a hammer, you attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt foes when they hit.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the heavy property

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Melandru's Resilience
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Channel the nature goddess Melandru, reinforcing yourself with rejuvenating vines, healing every turn, and potentially reducing your spell cost for each condition or hex affecting you.

For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per condition or harmful spell affecting you. Additionally, while at least suffering from one condition or harmful spell, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 1st level, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 19 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot. Reduce the number you need to roll by 1 for each condition or harmful spell affecting you beyond the first.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Melandru's Resilience
Elite Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +4 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration for each condition and hex you are suffering.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Restore Condition
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Purge most conditions on a creature and heal them for each condition removed.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. End all harmful conditions on the target, and the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per condition removed.
Restore Condition

Elite Spell. Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target other ally. For each condition removed, that ally is healed for 10...58...70 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Soul Leech
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Attach a soul leech to a creature, siphoning off health every time they cast a spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, they must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage per spell slot level, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the final damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Soul Leech
Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, you steal up to 16...67...80 Health from that foe.

spell.name: Mantra of Recall
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Chant a mantra of recall, potentially regaining spent spell slots at the end of it.
For the duration, when you expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 4th level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, you regain that spell slot when this spell ends.
Mantra of Recall
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, you gain no benefit from it. You gain 10...22...25 Energy when Mantra of Recall ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Mist Form
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Partially turn your body into mist, taking less damage from foes affected by water themed spells and healing all allies around you when casting an elemental spell.

For the duration, when you take damage from an enemy affected by one or more harmful water themed spells, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when you cast an elemental themed spell of 1st level or higher, choose any number of friendly creatures within 150-feet of you. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per spell slot level.
Mist Form

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...38...45 seconds, you take 33% less damage from foes under the effects of Water Magic hexes. Whenever you cast an elemental spell, all non-spirit allies in earshot are healed for 50...210...250% of the Energy cost of the spell.

components.m: a bottle of captured mist

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th and the final healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Earth Shaker

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 8, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Jump up into the air, shattering the earth around your target, knocking creatures {@condition prone} around them.

Target each creature other than you in a 10-foot radius centered on the target. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@dice 1d12} damage, and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Earth Shaker
Elite Hammer Attack. Target foe and all adjacent foes are knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Oath Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Fire an all-or-nothing shot, which allows you to immediately attack again on a hit but prevents you from using spells or abilities on a miss.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, you can immediately attack again, and the spell slot expended in the casting of this spell does not prevent you from casting other spells with spell slots this turn.
On a miss, you cannot cast spells or use abilities until the end of your next turn.
Oath Shot

Elite Bow Attack. If Oath Shot hits, all of your skills except Oath Shot are recharged. If it misses, all of your skills are disabled for 10...5...4 seconds. (50% miss chance with Expertise 7 or less.)

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Flourish

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Perform a magical flourish, allowing you to immediately afterward cast an attack spell.
Cast any level 2 or lower {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}, without using a spell slot, ignoring {@variantrule adrenaline|GW} cost, casting time, and components, which you have prepared.
Flourish
Elite Skill. All of your attack skills become recharged. You gain 2...6...7 Energy for each skill recharged by Flourish.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Poison Arrow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Attempt to poison and corrupt a creature by hitting them with a {@condition poisoned}-tipped arrow.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition poisoned} and {@condition corruption|GW|corrupted} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Poison Arrow
Elite Bow Attack. If Poison Arrow hits, your target becomes Poisoned for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Spiteful Spirit
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Utter a spiteful curse, hexing a target to damage everything around them every time they attack or cast a spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target casts a spell or makes an attack roll, target each hostile creature in a 10-foot Emanation around the target. Each target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.
Spiteful Spirit
Elite Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or uses a skill, Spiteful Spirit deals 5...29...35 shadow damage to that foe and all adjacent allies of that foe.

spell.name: Migraine
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Drive a psychic spike into a creature's mind, causing a horrible migraine, dealing damage every turn, and increasing their casting times.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn, and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 8d6} psychic damage. Additionally, the target can't cast spells as reactions, must cast spells that take a bonus action as an action, and any other spell takes twice as long to cast. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Migraine
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe suffers -1...7...8 Health degeneration and takes 100% longer to activate skills.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Gladiator's Defense
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Assume the fighting stance of a gladiator, gaining AC and striking back at foes who miss.

For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if a melee attack misses you because of this bonus, target the creature that attacked you. The target takes {@damage 4d6} slashing damage.
Gladiator's Defense
Elite Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Whenever you block a melee attack this way, the attacker suffers 5...29...35 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Practiced Stance
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Assume a stance practiced at applying preparations.

For the duration, when you cast a preparation spell, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot that is one level higher than the one used in the casting, cast it as a bonus action, and increase its duration to 1 hour.
Practiced Stance
Elite Stance. For 20...32...35 seconds, your Preparations recharge 50% faster and last 30...126...150% longer.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell slot increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Panic
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Spread panic throughout a group, preventing each other from casting spells or using abilities.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Target each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. When a target finishes casting a spell or successfully uses an ability, target each hostile creature other than the target in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn.
Panic
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...8...10 second[s], target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Panic. When a foe hexed with Panic successfully uses a skill, all other nearby foes are interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the radii each increase by 5 feet for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Thunderclap (Guild Wars)
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Cause a massive thunderclap at a location of your choice, disrupting and damaging foes.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d12} lightning damage and {@damage 2d8} thunder damage and is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} and has {@condition cracked armor|GW} for the duration and is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is affected for 1 round only and is not {@condition incapacitated}.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Thunderclap

Elite Spell. Create a massive shockwave at target foe's location. Deals 10...42...50 lightning damage to target and all adjacent foes. Struck foes are interrupted and suffer from Cracked Armor and Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} and {@dice 1d8} respectively for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Punishing Shot

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
You punish a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
Punishing Shot
Elite Bow Attack. If Punishing Shot hits, you strike for +10...18...20 damage and your target is interrupted.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Unyielding Aura
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Envelop yourself in an unyielding aura, which makes all your spells heal for more and resurrects on end.
For the duration, when you cast a spell that restores hit points, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and add the number rolled to the amount of hit points restored.

When this spell ends, randomly choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 100% of their maximum hit points and teleports within 5 feet of you in an unoccupied space.
Unyielding Aura

Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your Monk spells heal for +15...51...60% more Health. When this enchantment ends one random other party member is resurrected with full Health and Energy and teleported to your location.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Well of Power
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Extract the remaining magic of a corpse, healing allies in its area every turn, and empowering their magic.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, for the duration, you create a 20-foot-radius, 10-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each friendly creature in that Cylinder regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Additionally, when a friendly creature casts a spell while inside the spell's area, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 16 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot. A creature also regains these hit points if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature can only regain these hit points once per turn.

On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to exploit another corpse within range, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, to teleport the Cylinder to the location of the new corpse.
Well of Power

Elite Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Power at that location. For 8...18...20 seconds, allies within the area of Well of Power gain +1...5...6 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for every 2 slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Signet of Midnight
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Touch a creature, plunging you both into midnight, blinding you both.
You touch a creature. The target and you are {@condition blinded} for the duration.
Signet of Midnight
Elite Signet. You and target touched foe become Blinded for 15 seconds.

spell.name: Ward Against Harm
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Conjure a watery ward at your location, protecting your allies from damage and healing them every turn.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. When a target takes acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage, if the target is in the radius of the spell, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Additionally, when a target takes damage, if the target is in the radius of the spell, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Also, each friendly creature regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier when it enters the ward's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
Ward Against Harm

Elite Ward Spell. Create a Ward Against Harm at this location. For 5...13...15 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have +1...3...3 health regeneration, +12...22...24 armor, and an additional +12...22...24 armor against elemental damage. This spell is disabled for 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Wither
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Curse a creature's flesh to wither, dealing damage to them every turn and reducing their initiative.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d4}. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
If the target's initiative is ever 0 or lower, this spell ends, and the target takes {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage.
Wither

Elite Hex Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, target foe suffers -2...4...4 Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes 15...63...75 damage and Wither ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st and the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Water Trident
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Conjure up a watery trident and throw it at up to three creatures, knocking {@condition prone} moving targets.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target up to two other creatures other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Make a ranged spell attack with advantage against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 2d8} cold damage and, if a target willingly moved on its last turn, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Water Trident
Elite Spell. Send out a fast-moving Water Trident, striking target foe and up to 2 adjacent foes for 10...74...90 cold damage if it hits. If it hits a moving foe, that foe is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Glyph of Concentration
entries: Inscribe a glyph of {@status concentration} into your spellcasting focus, improving the next {@status concentration} spell you cast.

For the duration, the next time you cast a {@status concentration} spell, you cannot be interrupted while casting it, you have a +5 bonus to Constitution saving throws made to hold {@status concentration} on that spell, and you ignore the {@condition dazed|GW} condition for the casting of that spell.
Glyph of Concentration
Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and ignores the effects of being Dazed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Griffon's Sweep/Leviathan's Sweep

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Channel the power of the griffon, dive attacking, knocking {@condition prone}, and damaging even on a miss.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 2d8} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Griffon's Sweep
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...29...34 damage.
Leviathan's Sweep
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...29...34 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit or miss.

spell.name: Dwayna's Kiss
entries: Send a prayer to Dwayna, goddess of light and life, to restore health to a creature, increasing for each spell on them.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier{@dice  + 2d6} per spell on the target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the base healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Dwayna's Kiss
Spell. Heal target other ally for 15...51...60 Health and an additional 10...30...35 Health for each enchantment or hex on that ally.

spell.name: Rush
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Channel your adrenaline into increasing your movement speed.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 30%.
Rush
Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you move 25% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Fertile Season
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Summon a nature spirit of the fertile season, improving health and reducing damage take for anyone affected.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, the creature's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 10 and when a creature takes damage, you roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Fertile Season
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range have +50...130...150 maximum Health and gain +8 armor. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

components.m: freshly cut grass

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a creature's hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Tiger's Fury/Bestial Fury
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Invoke the great spirit of the tiger, entering a fury in which you can attack more often but cannot cast any spells.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, but you cannot cast spells.
Tiger's Fury
Stance. All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.
Bestial Fury
Stance. All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blood Ritual
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 17%
Sacrifice some of your own blood to fuel another creature's spells.

You touch a creature, other than yourself. For the duration, when the creature would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 5th level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 17 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
Blood Ritual
Enchantment Spell. For 8...13...14 seconds, target touched ally gains +3 Energy regeneration. Blood Ritual cannot be used on the caster.

components.m: a small knife

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Armor of Frost
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Conjure up a suit of frost armor around you, encasing you in protective ice that also improves your water magic.

For the duration, when you cast a water themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. Additionally, when you take bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Armor of Frost
Enchantment Spell. For 10...29...34 seconds, you gain +40 armor against physical damage and have +1 Water Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Spirit of Failure
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Create an illusion in a creature's mind, instilling them with an intense feeling of failure, making them more likely to miss with attacks, and improving your initiative every time they do so.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target makes an attack roll with a weapon, they must roll a {@dice d12} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll. Additionally, if the target misses with a weapon attack, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d6}. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Spirit of Failure
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks. You gain 1...3...3 Energy whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Illusion of Weakness
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} You can choose to lose up to a maximum of 20 hit points.
Create an illusion of {@condition weakness|GW}, tricking your opponents into thinking you are weaker than you appear.
For the duration, if you are below 25% of your maximum hit points, this spell ends.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to the health lost.
If you fall {@condition unconscious}, this spell ends without healing you.
Illusion of Weakness
Enchantment Spell. You lose 50...202...240 Health. Illusion of Weakness ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum. When Illusion of Weakness ends, you gain 50...202...240 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Enfeeble
entries: Utter an enfeebling curse, {@condition weakness|GW|weakening} a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
