The number of targets you can target with this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Enfeeble
Spell. Target suffers from Weakness for 10...26...30 seconds.

spell.name: Holy Wrath
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Give a creature a blessing of divine retribution, reflecting back attack damage on any who dare attack them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage from a weapon attack, target the creature that dealt the damage. The new target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the new target takes 66% of the damage they dealt as radiant damage (minimum 1, maximum 20). On a successful save, the new target takes half as much damage.
After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4} times on the target, this spell ends.
Holy Wrath
Enchantment Spell. For 10...26...30 seconds, the next 1...8...10 time[s] target other ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 66% of the damage back to the source (maximum of 5...41...50 damage).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 2nd and the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Malign Intervention
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Put a curse of undeath on a creature, reducing their healing and animating them as a masterless {@creature Bone Horror|GW} if they die.

Choose one non-undead creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target regains hit points, they regain 20% fewer hit points. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.

If the target dies, a {@creature Bone Horror|GW} is created at the target's location. The {@creature Bone Horror|GW} acts on the target's initiative, is hostile towards everything, and is in the DM's control.
The {@creature Bone Horror|GW} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.
Malign Intervention
Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe receives 20% less benefit from healing. If target foe dies while hexed with Malign Intervention, a level 1...14...17 masterless bone horror is summoned.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st and use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block.

spell.name: Armor of Mist
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Encase yourself in a shielding armor of mist, improving your defense and agility.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 33%, and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Armor of Mist
Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +10...34...40 armor and move 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Inspired Enchantment/Revealed Enchantment
entries: Remove a positive spell on a creature, gain initiative, and replace this spell with the removed spell for the duration.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed safe, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4} and replace this spell with the ended spell for the duration.
Inspired Enchantment
Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe and gain 3...13...15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.
Revealed Enchantment
Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe and gain 3...13...15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Revealed Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Essence Bond
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Create an essence bond between you and a creature, charging up your magical abilities every time the creature takes damage.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot. When the target takes damage from a non-friendly source, reduce the number you need to roll for the next roll by 2.
Essence Bond
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes physical or elemental damage, you gain 1 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Plague Sending
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 10%
Sacrifice some life essence to transfer a number of conditions from yourself to a group of creatures.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, each target gains a copy of the latest {@dice 1d4} harmful conditions on yourself.
End all copied conditions on yourself. On a successful save, a target gains a copy with its duration reduced to 1 round.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Plague Sending
Spell. Transfer 1...3...3 negative condition[s] and [its/their] remaining duration[s] from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, copy {@dice 1d4} additional condition for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Healing Spring
entries: Prepare a healing spring, which heals creatures which trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a chosen creature enters the spell's area, while it does not have all its hit points, the trap triggers, applying the following effects for 5 rounds:
Each chosen creature regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
This trap is nearly {@condition invisible}, requiring a successful Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against your spell save DC to be discerned.
Healing Spring
Trap. For 10 seconds, all adjacent allies are healed for 15...51...60 every 2 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

components.m: a drop of spring water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Grasping Earth
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Make the earth around you cling to creatures, slowing them down.

Target each creature other than you within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target's speed is reduced by 50% for the duration. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
Grasping Earth
Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, all nearby foes move 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mantra of Concentration
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Start chanting a Mantra of {@status Concentration|XPHB}, improving your ability to maintain {@status concentration} on the next spell.

For the duration, the next time you cast a {@status concentration} spell, you cannot be interrupted while casting it, and you have a +5 bonus to Constitution saving throws made to hold {@status concentration} on that spell.
Mantra of Concentration
Stance. For 1...31...38 seconds, the next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 2 rounds for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Life Attunement
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Attune a creature to life and healing, decreasing their attack damage, but increasing the healing they receive.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target regains hit points, they regain 25% more hit points but deal 25% less damage with weapon attacks.
Life Attunement
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 30% less damage with attacks, but gains 14...43...50% more Health when healed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the % increases by 25% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Otyugh's Cry
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}, {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}
Invoke the famous ogre beast master Otyugh to protect and enhance your companions.

Choose any number of companions, that can hear you within range. When a target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, each targets gains the Unblockable property on their attacks.
Otyugh's Cry
Shout. For 10...22...25 seconds, your animal companion gains +24 armor and cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Axe Twist

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Twist your weapon into an existing wound, weakening your target.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and if the target has a {@condition deep wound|GW}, the target becomes {@condition weakness|GW|weak} for the duration and takes an additional {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Axe Twist
Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for 1...16...20 more damage and that foe suffers from Weakness for 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Shame
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Instill an intense sense of shame into a creature, stopping their next spell, which targets an ally of theirs.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next time the target casts a spell that targets an ally of theirs, the spell fails and has no effect, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d8}, and your initiative gets increased by the initiative lost. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Shame
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally, the spell fails and you steal up to 5...12...14 Energy from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Symbiosis
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Summon a nature spirit of the Symbiosis, improving health for every beneficial spell on a creature.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, the creature's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for each beneficial spell on them.
Symbiosis

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For each enchantment on a non-spirit creature within range, that creature has +27...125...150 maximum Health. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Additionally, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a creature's hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Belly Smash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Strike a {@condition prone} creature so hard that the blood spatter of the impact blinds adjacent creatures.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d12} damage, and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, targets each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Belly Smash
Hammer Attack. If this attack strikes a foe who is knocked down, the resulting dust cloud will blind adjacent foes for 3...6...7 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Wastrel's Worry
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Transform a creature's momentary indecision into a psychic shock.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. At the end of the creature's next turn, if it did not use any abilities or cast any spells successfully, target each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Wastrel's Worry
Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take 20...84...100 damage. If that foe successfully uses a skill, Wastrel's Worry ends prematurely and does no damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Touch of Agony/Wallow's Bite
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 10%
Sacrifice your own blood to inflict untold agony on a creature.
Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 5d8}), 11th level ({@dice 7d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 9d8}).
Touch of Agony
Skill. Target touched foe takes 20...50...58 shadow damage.
Wallow's Bite
Skill. Target touched foe takes 20...50...58 damage.

spell.name: Desperation Blow/Drunken Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You attempt a desperate blow, uncertain of the outcome.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d12} damage, and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, roll a {@dice d4}. Depending on the result, the target gains one of the following conditions for the duration: 1 - {@condition Deep Wound|GW}, 2 - {@condition Weakness|GW}, 3 - {@condition Bleeding|GW} ({@damage 2d6} damage), 4 - {@condition Crippled|GW}. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
You are knocked {@condition prone}, and cannot stand up this turn.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Desperation Blow

Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage, and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Desperation Blow, you are knocked down.
Drunken Blow

Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Drunken Blow, you are knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Contemplation of Purity
entries: Purge yourself of all impurities by stripping yourself of all your beneficial spells.
End all beneficial spells on yourself. For each beneficial spell ended this way, repeat all the following effects:
- You regain {@dice 1d4} hit points.
- The latest harmful spell on yourself ends.
- End the latest harmful condition on yourself.
You can end a maximum of 2 harmful spells or conditions this way.
Contemplation of Purity
Skill. Lose all enchantments. For each one lost, you gain 0...64...80 Health, lose one hex, and lose one condition (maximum 1...7...8 hexes and conditions).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the maximum increases by 2 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Awaken the Blood
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Imbue your blood with necromantic energy, drawing out its true potential.

For the duration, when you cast a blood or curses themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. Additionally, when you sacrifice health for a spell, you must sacrifice 50% more.
Awaken the Blood
Enchantment Spell. For 20...39...44 seconds, you gain +2 Blood Magic and +2 Curses, but whenever you sacrifice Health, you sacrifice 50% more than the normal amount.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: I Will Survive!
entries: Shout, “I Will Survive!”, granting yourself the strength you need to though out conditions affecting you.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per condition affecting you.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
"I Will Survive!"
Shout. You gain +3 Health regeneration for each condition you are suffering. This regeneration expires after 5...10...11 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Arcane Thievery/Arcane Larceny
entries: Use your arcane skills to steal an enemy's spell.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed safe, one random spell the target has prepared cannot be used for the duration. Also replace this spell with the disabled spell for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Arcane Thievery
Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe, and Arcane Thievery is replaced by that spell.
Arcane Larceny
Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe and Arcane Larceny is replaced by that spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target makes its saving throw with disadvantage. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can choose which spell gets disabled.

spell.name: Chain Lightning (Guild Wars)
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}, {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 2
Conjure a bolt of lightning that bounces between enemies.
Choose one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 5d12} lightning damage.

If you hit the target, the attack leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice within 30 feet of the target. Make a new attack roll against the new target, and make a new damage roll, which could cause the attack to leap again.
A creature can be targeted only once by each casting of this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 4th.
Chain Lightning
Spell. Target foe and up to two other foes near your target are struck for 10...70...85 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

spell.name: Ethereal Burden/Kitah's Burden
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW|Hex:} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Put ethereal shackles on a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the target's speed is halved. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only, and you do not regain the spell slot when the spell ends.
When this spell ends, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting of the spell.
Ethereal Burden
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When Ethereal Burden ends, you gain 10...16...18 Energy.
Kitah's Burden
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When Kitah's Burden ends you gain 10...16...18 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Protective Bond
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Form a protective bond between yourself and the target, limiting the damage they can take in one hit, by expending spell slots.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target would take damage, if that damage would be more than 5% of the target's maximum hit points, reduce the damage to 5% of the target's maximum hit points by expending one of your spell slots of your choice. If you cannot expend a spell slot, this spell ends.
Protective Bond

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally cannot lose more than 5% max Health due to damage from a single attack or spell. When Protective Bond prevents damage, you lose 6...4...3 Energy or the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Brutal Strike
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Command your pet to attempt a Brutal Strike.

Choose one companion that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 3d10} damage, and if the target was below 50% of their maximum hit points, the target takes an additional {@damage 4d6} damage.
Brutal Strike
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Brutal Strike that deals +5...29...35 damage. If that attack strikes a foe whose Health is below 50%, that foe takes an additional +5...29...35 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Crushing Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Strike a creature while they are prone to crush an appendage, inflicting a {@condition deep wound|GW}.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d12} damage, and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, suffers from a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Crushing Blow
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If you hit a knocked-down foe you inflict a Deep Wound, lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Crystal Wave
entries: Release a wave of crystal energy, which purifies any negative conditions affecting a creature, dealing more damage for each removed.

Target each creature other than you within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 5d10} force damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Also end all harmful conditions on a target. A target takes {@damage 1d10} force damage for each condition ended.
Crystal Wave
Spell. Foes adjacent to you are struck for 10...58...70 damage but are cured of any negative conditions. Each condition removed deals 5...13...15 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Deathly Chill
entries: Put the chill of death into a creature, dealing increased damage to high-health creatures.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 2d8 + 2} cold damage, and if the target was above 50% of their maximum hit points, they take an additional {@damage 2d8 + 2} cold damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Deathly Chill
Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...41...50 cold damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you deal an additional 5...41...50 shadow damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@dice 1d8 + 1} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Deadly Riposte

time.condition: which you take when you are hit by a melee attack

entries: Counter an opponent's attack with a deadly riposte.

If you are wielding a one-handed melee weapon with the light or finesse properties, choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage, starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage, and the attack roll misses.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Deadly Riposte
Skill. For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you, and your attacker is struck for 15...75...90 damage and begins Bleeding for 3...21...25 seconds.

components.m: a one-handed melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the light and/or finesse properties

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Iron Mist
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Ionize some iron dust, making it form a mist around you, protecting you and empowering your air magic.

For the duration, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Also, casting air, lightning or thunder themed spells with a spell slot does not prevent you from casting other spells with spell slots during the same turn, and you can cast air, lightning or thunder themed spells which take an action to cast as a bonus action, but any air, lightning or thunder themed spell you cast causes you to gain 2 rounds of {@condition overcast|GW}.
Iron Mist
Enchantment Spell. For 8...14...15 seconds, you have +15 armor. Your Air Magic spells that target a foe activate and recharge 25% faster, but you are Overcast by 3 points.

components.m: a handful of iron powder

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Predatory Season
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Summon a nature spirit of the Predatory Season, reducing healing and making creatures gain health every time they hit with a weapon attack.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, when the creature regains hit points, they regain 20% less hit points and when the creature hits with a weapon attack, they regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}, which is not reduced by this spell.
Predatory Season

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all healing is reduced by 20%. If any of your attacks hit, you gain 5 Health. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: a drop of fresh blood

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Bonetti's Defense
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 8, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Magically invoke the stance of the famous fencer Bonetti, and increase your AC against weapon attacks until you use a spell.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if an attack misses you because of this bonus, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d8}.
When you cast a spell, this spell ends.
Bonetti's Defense
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. You gain 5 Energy for each successful melee attack blocked. Bonetti's Defense ends if you use a skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Disciplined Stance
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Refuse to give into the adrenaline of battle, and focus on your training, improving AC and reducing damage, as long as you do not expend adrenaline.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
When you cast a spell which requires adrenaline, this spell ends.
Disciplined Stance
Stance. For 1...3...4 second[s], you gain +10 armor and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Disciplined Stance ends if you use an adrenal skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Kinetic Armor
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Conjure an armor around you, which renews itself by siphoning off a small amount of spell energy.

For the duration, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, the duration of this spell resets.
Kinetic Armor
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, you gain +20...68...80 armor. Whenever you cast a spell, Kinetic Armor is renewed for 8 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shock
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}, {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 5
Infuse your hands with lightning energy and punch a creature, knocking them {@condition prone} on a hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d12} lightning damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Shock
Skill. Target touched foe is knocked down and struck for 10...50...60 lightning damage. This skill has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Pure Strike/Jaizhenju Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Perform a pure strike, untainted by any stances.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 3d6} damage.
If you are not in a stance, this attack gains the Unblockable property.
Pure Strike
Sword Attack. If Pure Strike hits, you strike for +1...24...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Pure Strike cannot be blocked.
Jaizhenju Strike
Sword Attack. If Jaizhenju Strike hits, you strike for +1...24...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Jaizhenju Strike cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Sympathetic Visage/Ancestor's Visage
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Create a visage for a friendly creature, which punishes all those who attack them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target gets hit by a melee weapon attack, target each hostile creature in a 10-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each target loses all adrenaline and their initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}.
Sympathetic Visage
Enchantment Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.
Ancestor's Visage
Enchantment Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Watchful Spirit
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Use some of your divine energy to place a watchful spirit over a creature, healing them every turn and for a larger amount when the spell ends.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
When this spell ends, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 8d4} + your spellcasting ability.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends without healing the target.
Watchful Spirit
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains +2 Health regeneration. That ally is healed for 30...150...180 Health when Watchful Spirit ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the healing on spell end increases each by {@dice 4d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Well of Suffering
entries: Utter a foul curse, exploding a corpse into a well of suffering, damaging foes in its area every turn.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, for the duration, you create a 20-foot-radius, 10-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each hostile creature in that Cylinder must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to exploit another corpse within range, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, to teleport the Cylinder to the location of the new corpse.
Well of Suffering
Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Suffering at its location. For 10...26...30 seconds, foes in that area suffer -1...5...6 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Blackout
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Completely blackout yourself and a creature you touch, preventing you both from using spells or abilities.
You touch a creature. The target and you cannot cast spells or use abilities for the duration.
Blackout
Skill. For 2...5...6 seconds, all of touched target foe's skills are disabled, and all of your skills are disabled for 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: To the Limit!
entries: Push yourself to your limit, overcoming your fatigue.
You gain {@dice 1d2} strikes of adrenaline for each hostile creature within range.
For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 2d10}.
"To the Limit!"
Shout. For each foe within earshot (maximum 1...5...6), you gain one strike of adrenaline. For 10...18...20 seconds, your maximum Health is increased by 10...50...60.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Earthquake/Dragon's Stomp
entries: {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 5
Cause a massive earthquake in a small area, knocking down creatures and damaging them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 7d10} force damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.
Earthquake
Spell. You invoke an Earthquake at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26...85...100 earth damage.
Dragon's Stomp
Spell. You invoke a Dragon's Stomp at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26...85...100 earth damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Price of Failure
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Curse a creature to be more inaccurate and punish them for missing with their attacks.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target makes an attack roll with a weapon, they must roll a {@dice d6} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll. Additionally, if the target misses with a weapon attack, they take {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Price of Failure
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks and takes 1...37...46 damage whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Edge of Extinction
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Summon a nature spirit of Extinction, damaging all creatures of the same type when one of them dies.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, and they drop to 0 hit points, all creatures of the same creature type take {@damage 2d10} force damage if they are also within 120 feet of the nature spirit.
Edge of Extinction

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. If a non-spirit creature within range dies, Edge of Extinction deals 14...43...50 damage to all creatures of the same type that are below 90% Health and within range of the spirit. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 4th.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Flame Burst
entries: A burst of flames shoots out from you, searing all creatures near you.

Target each creature other than you within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Flame Burst
Spell. All nearby foes are struck for 15...99...120 fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blessed Aura
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Surround yourself with a shimmering blessed aura, extending the duration of your spells.
For the duration, when you cast a holy themed spell, with a timed duration, extend that duration by 25%.
Blessed Aura
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, Monk enchantments you cast last 10...30...35% longer.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the % increases by 25% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Incendiary Bonds
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}, {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 2
Tether yourself to a creature, charging up a flame expulsion, damaging and {@condition burning|GW} all creatures around the target after a short delay.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. When this spell ends because its duration ran out or the target drops to 0 hit points, target each hostile creature in a 15-foot Emanation around the target. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GW} for 1 round, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.
Incendiary Bonds
Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 20...68...80 fire damage and are set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s]. Activates early if target foe dies.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: I Will Avenge You!
entries: Shout “I Will Avenge You!” regaining health every turn and increasing your attack speed.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn and at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} hit points.
The duration increases by 1 round for each {@condition unconscious} or dead ally within range.
"I Will Avenge You!"
Shout. For each dead ally, you gain 10 seconds of +3...6...7 Health regeneration and your attack speed increases by 25%.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mend Condition
entries: Purge one condition on a creature and heal them.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. End the latest harmful condition on the target. Then the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} if a condition was removed.
Mend Condition

Spell. Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target other ally. If a condition is removed, that ally is healed for 5...57...70 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dust Trap
entries: Prepare a dust trap, which damages and blinds creatures which trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effect for 5 rounds:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d12} bludgeoning damage and becomes {@condition blinded} for one minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
This trap is nearly {@condition invisible}, requiring a successful Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against your spell save DC to be discerned.
Dust Trap

Trap. When Dust Trap is triggered, every second (for 5 seconds total), all nearby foes are Blinded for 3...7...8 seconds and take 10...22...25 damage. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted. Dust Trap ends after 90 seconds.

components.m: a handful of fine sand

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ether Lord
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Sheath yourself in woven ether, donning the robes of an ether lord, elevating your spellcasting to new heights, at a cost.
You lose all 1st level, and lower, spell slots.
For the duration, 1st level and lower spells do not require spell slots.
Ether Lord
Hex Spell. You lose all Energy. For 5...9...10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...3 Energy degeneration, and you experience +1...3...3 Energy regeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the level of the spells and spell slots each increases by 1 for every two slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Malaise
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Afflict yourself with a malaise and spread it to an enemy, corrupting their spellcasting.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of your turns, you take {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage. Additionally, for the duration, when the target expends a spell slot to cast a spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 12 or lower, the spell expends an additional spell slot. If an additional spell slot is expended this way, this spell ends and the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Malaise

Hex Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Energy degeneration and you suffer -1 Health degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes 5...41...50 damage and Malaise ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Swirling Aura
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Envelop yourself in a watery aura, regaining health every turn and increasing your defense against projectiles.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d6}. Additionally, for the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against ranged weapon attacks.
{@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} Choose any number of friendly creatures that you can see within 150-feet. A target also gains the effect of this spell.
Swirling Aura

Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, you are enchanted with Swirling Aura and have 1...5...6 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block projectiles. If you are Overcast when you cast this spell, all party members in earshot are also enchanted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Guilt
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Worm yourself into the consciousness of a creature by inducing an intense feeling of guilt.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next time the target casts a spell that targets an enemy of theirs, the spell fails and has no effect, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 4d8}, and your initiative gets increased by the initiative lost. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Guilt
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets a foe, the spell fails and you steal up to 5...12...14 Energy from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Vengeance
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW|Enchantment:} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Bring back a dead creature for a short duration to enact vengeance.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 100% of their maximum hit points. For the duration, the target deals an additional 25% damage.
When this spell ends, any target returned to life by this spell dies.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Vengeance

Enchantment Spell. Bring target dead party member back to life at full Health and full Energy. For 30 seconds, that party member deals 25% more damage. When this enchantment ends, target party member dies. Deaths while under the effects of this enchantment do not incur a death penalty.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Windborne Speed
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Imbue a creature with the speed of the wind.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's speed is increased by 33%.
Windborne Speed
Enchantment Spell. For 5...11...13 seconds, target ally moves 33% faster.

components.m: a quill

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Divine Healing/Heaven's Delight
entries: Bestow upon your party the divine grace of your deity.
Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Divine Healing
Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...51...60 points.
Heaven's Delight
Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...51...60 points.

spell.name: Consume Corpse
entries: Exploit a corpse to teleport to its location and empower yourself.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target and teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space that you can see. Then you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Consume Corpse
Spell. Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and gain 25...85...100 Health and 5...17...20 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the healing increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dryder's Defenses
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Channel the magical defenses of dryder's, increasing your armor against attacks and taking less damage from elemental damage.

For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and when you take acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Dryder's Defenses
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you gain 75% chance to block attacks and 34...55...60 armor against elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Verata's Gaze
entries: Channel the master necromancer Verata and gain control of an undead minion.

Choose one undead creature, which has been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes friendly to you and your allies and hostile towards its original creator and their allies.
The amount of targets you can target with this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Verata's Gaze

Spell. If target hostile animated undead has a master, its bond to its master is broken, making it hostile to all other creatures. If it had no master, you become its master. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

spell.name: Verata's Aura
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 33%
Suffuse an area around you with the commanding presence of Verata, the master Necromancer, and gain control of all undead minions.

Choose any number of hostile undead creatures, which have been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see within range. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, a target becomes friendly to you and your allies and hostile towards its original creator and their allies. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
Verata's Aura

Enchantment Spell. All hostile animated undead in the area become bound to you. Verata's Aura ends after 120...264...300 seconds. When Verata's Aura ends, you lose your bond with any undead bound to you. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

components.m: a treatise written on necromancy written by a powerful necromancer

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Frozen Soil
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Conjure a spirit of Frozen Soil, trapping souls in the afterlife, preventing resurrection.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, any spell that can resurrect a creature fails and has no effect.
Frozen Soil
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range cannot activate resurrection skills. This spirit dies after 30...78...90 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Deflect Arrows
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Ready yourself to redirect arrows at your enemies vitals, inflicting {@condition bleeding|GW} on a successful block.

For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks, and if a ranged weapon attack misses you, target each hostile creature within a 10-foot Emanation. A target starts {@condition bleeding|GW}, taking {@damage 2d6} damage for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Deflect Arrows
Stance. For 1...5...6 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks. If you block a projectile attack, adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding for 5...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd and the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Light of Dwayna
entries: Shine the light of Dwayna down on your fallen allies, brining them back to life.

Choose any number of friendly creatures, which have not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within a 20-foot Emanation. A target returns to life with 25% of their maximum hit points. A target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Light of Dwayna
Spell. Resurrect all dead party members in the area. They are returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.

components.m: diamonds worth 300 gp for each target, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Dark Fury
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}, {@variantrule Order|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 17%
Channel dark energies through your allies, whipping them into a frenzy, allowing them to generate adrenaline.
Target each friendly creature within range. For the duration, a target gains one strike of adrenaline when they take damage, or when they hit with a weapon attack.
Dark Fury
Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever any party member hits with an attack, that party member gains one hit of adrenaline. (50% failure chance with Blood Magic of 4 or less.)

components.m: a piece of flesh of a rabid warg

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Muddy Terrain
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Call forth a spirit of muddy terrain, slowing down all creatures.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, a creature's speed is reduced by 5 feet, and they cannot benefit from any effects which increase their speed.
Muddy Terrain
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range move 10% slower and speed boosts have no effect. This spirit dies after 30...78...90 seconds.

components.m: a handful of dirt and a cup of water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Riposte

time.condition: which you take when you are hit by a melee attack roll

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4
Counter an opponent's attack with a riposte.

If you are wielding a one-handed melee weapon with the light and/or finesse properties, choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage, and the attack roll misses.
Riposte
Skill. For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you and your attacker is struck for 20...68...80 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Glyph of Sacrifice
entries: Inscribe the glyph of sacrifice on your arcane focus, allowing you to cast any spell as a reaction by temporarily disabling it.
For the duration, the next {@dice 1d4} spells, with a casting time of one minute or less, can be cast as a reaction, but if cast this way, they cannot be cast again until you finish a short rest.
Glyph of Sacrifice
Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell casts instantly, but it takes an additional 30 seconds to recharge. Ends prematurely if you use a non-spell skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mantra of Signets
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Start chanting a mantra of signets, improving your defense for every signet prepared, and healing yourself every time you use a signet.

For the duration, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} for every two {@variantrule signet|GW} spells you have prepared and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when you cast a {@variantrule signet|GW} spell, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Mantra of Signets
Stance. For 10...34...40 seconds, you have +3 armor for each signet you have equipped. Whenever you use a signet you gain 5...49...60 health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Desecrate Enchantments/Defile Enchantments
entries: Turn the enchantments of a group of creatures against them, dealing increased damage per enchantment on them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage. If a target was under the effect of a beneficial spell, a target takes an additional {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage per beneficial spell on them. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Desecrate Enchantments
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 6...49...60 shadow damage and 4...17...20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.
Defile Enchantments
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 6...49...60 shadow damage and 4...17...20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the base damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mark of Rodgort
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Inscribe the mark of Rodgort into the flesh of a group of creatures, causing them to erupt into flames whenever they take fire damage.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when a target takes fire damage except from {@condition burning|GW}, it starts {@condition burning|GW} for 1 round, taking {@damage 4d6} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected by the spell for 1 round only.
Mark of Rodgort
Hex Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Mark of Rodgort. For 10...30...35 seconds, whenever each foe is struck for fire damage, that foe is set on fire for 1...3...4 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration of the {@condition burning|GW} condition increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Infuse Condition
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Create a tether between yourself and any undead minions you have, automatically transferring conditions from yourself to them.
For the duration, when you would gain one or more harmful conditions, the closest friendly undead creature, which has been created by a spell or an ability, within 30 feet of you, gains it instead.
Infuse Condition
Enchantment Spell. For the next 15...51...60 seconds, whenever you receive a condition, that condition is transferred to your closest minion instead.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 15 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Signet of Weariness
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Tire out a group of enemies with your signet of weariness, afflicting them with {@condition weakness|GW} and lowering their initiative.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} for the duration, and their initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d8}. On a successful save, the target's initiative is reduced by half as much and is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Signet of Weariness
Signet. Target foe and all nearby foes lose 3...7...8 Energy and suffer from Weakness for 1...10...12 second[s].

spell.name: Searing Heat
entries: Cause an area of extreme heat, searing all those inside.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 15-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. Each creature in that Sphere must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Sphere or ends its turn there, or if the Sphere moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Sphere up to 60 feet.
When this spell ends, all creatures in the spell's area start {@condition burning|GW} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

components.m: a handful of coals and a bellow

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
Searing Heat

Spell. Cause Searing Heat at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes near this location are struck for 10...34...40 fire damage each second. When Searing Heat ends, foes in the area of effect are set on fire for 3 seconds.

spell.name: Scourge Sacrifice
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Muddle the power of blood for a group of creatures, requiring them to sacrifice twice as much health for sacrifice spells.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when a target sacrifices health for a spell, they must sacrifice 100% more. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
Scourge Sacrifice
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, every time target foe and adjacent foes sacrifice life, they sacrifice twice the normal amount.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Verata's Sacrifice
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 15%
Channel the devotion to his minions the great Necromancer Verata had, sacrificing yourself to heal them and cleanse them of most conditions.

Choose any number of friendly undead creatures, which have been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see. You gain a copy of each harmful condition on a target. End all copied conditions on a target. Additionally, for the duration at the start of each of a target's turns, a target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d4}.
If a target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on them.
If you cast this spell while you have control over less than 4 friendly undead creatures, which have been created by a spell or an ability, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting.
Verata's Sacrifice

Spell. For 5...9...10 seconds, your undead allies gain +10 Health regeneration. All conditions are removed from those allies and transferred to you. If this spell is successful and you have control of 3 or fewer minions, Verata's Sacrifice instantly recharges.

components.m: a drop of blood

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Symbiotic Bond
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Form a symbiotic bond between yourself and an companion, giving them health regeneration, and absorbing damage for them.

Choose one companion, that can hear you within range. For the duration, the companion has resistance to all damage. Also, each time the companion takes damage, you lose health equal to the damage taken. Additionally, for the duration, at the start of each of the companion's turns, the companion regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Symbiotic Bond
Shout. For 120...264...300 seconds, your animal companion gains 1...3...3 Health regeneration, and half of all damage dealt to your animal companion is redirected to you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Spinal Shivers/Shivers of Dread
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Make a creature extremely sensitive to the cold, interrupting them every time they take cold damage.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes cold damage, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn.
Spinal Shivers
Hex Spell. For 10...34...40 seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill, that foe is interrupted, and you lose 10...6...5 Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.
Shivers of Dread
Hex Spell. For 10...34...40 seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill, that foe is interrupted and you lose 10...6...5 Energy or Shivers of Dread ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Bestial Pounce/Savage Pounce
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Command your pet to attempt a Bestial Pounce, knocking down creatures who cast a spell on their last turn.

Choose one companion that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d10} damage, and, if the target cast a spell on its last turn, the target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Bestial Pounce
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Pounce that deals +5...17...20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.
Savage Pounce
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Savage Pounce that deals +5...17...20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

background.name: Ascalon
entries: Once, Ascalon was a beautiful, fertile land of rolling green countryside and magnificent cities. Her people were viewed as grim by their neighbors. This was perhaps, to be expected, given their never-ending war against the aggressive Charr. Indeed, it was their unfailing vigilance, their Great Northern Wall, and the blood they shed each year to defend it that had protected not only Ascalon, but also Kryta and Orr through the ages.
Then came the invasion, and with it, the Searing.

Anyone alive today will remember the day the lands of Ascalon were blasted and torn with magic fire. Whole cities and guilds were destroyed in the Searing, and the might of Ascalon was shattered. Now the Great Northern Wall lies broken, and the Charr have overrun much of the kingdom, defiling it with their unholy shrines, killing those who stand in their way.

The survival of Ascalon hinges on but a single remaining corner of the fallen kingdom—the capital city of Rin. In the final years of the last Guild War, the people of Rin looked to a soldier named Adelbern, a simple man of humble origins, who rallied the people with his courage and cunning and steeled them not only against the guilds of Orr and Kryta but also against the terrors of the Charr.

The sudden destruction of most of the kingdom during the Searing has taken much of the fight out of the man now known as King Adelbern. He has become stubborn and set in his ways, afraid of losing what little he has left. But in his son Rurik, the people see a leader with the courage to perhaps help them reclaim their fallen kingdom.

The survivors of Ascalon live in a state of constant warfare, using hit-and-run tactics and the remnants of the Great Wall to prevent any significant advances by the Charr into their territory. King Adelbern has circled the wagons, so to speak, content to simply defend what Ascalon has left and live to fight another day. Prince Rurik, on the other hand, is far more daring than his father thinks is wise, and has even suggested that the time may be coming to launch an offensive against the Charr.

Already the rumbling of the winds of change can be heard in the streets. People are frightened. They wonder what will become of them. Some even wonder aloud if Adelbern has lost what it takes to steer Ascalon back from the brink. They wish to see the prince step up and take command of the kingdom. Perhaps under his guidance, the people of Ascalon will live on to see another golden age.

background.name: Crystal Desert
entries: Legends tell of a time, thousands of years ago, when the Crystal Desert was covered in water. These legends claim that it was the gods who raised the land, leaving it bare and empty in order to give the solitary creatures of the world a place to call their own. If the legends are true, humans were not among those for whom this land was made. There have been attempts by humans to settle in the desert, but they have, without exception, failed miserably, leaving behind only the grand monuments they built here proclaiming their short-lived triumph over this harsh land.

The weather in the Crystal Desert is hot and unforgiving. The winds blow hard, making and unmaking dunes, covering up the present and uncovering the past. An examination of the sand will reveal that each grain is actually a tiny, pointed crystal. In isolated locations, larger crystal formations have been revealed by the constant, unforgiving wind.

background.name: Maguuma Jungle
entries: Years ago, many tribes of human druids lived among the Maguuma's lush greenery and wildlife. But it has been a long time since anyone has heard word from them, and many believe that they were eaten by hostile jungle creatures or simply swallowed whole by the man-eating plants now rampant in the jungle.

The higher elevations are mostly devoid of water. Only the largest and hardiest of plants can live here. But down farther, closer to the water table, the Maguuma grows thick. The vegetation can become so dense that there are areas of the jungle floor that have never been touched by the sun's light.

background.name: Northeastern Kryta
